trans-unit.source: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, and composition text as initial values for the new instance.

If this constructor is used to create a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>, the new instance will have <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> set to **On**.
An input manager to associate with this text composition.
A source element for this text composition.
The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
A string containing the initial text for the composition.
This parameter will become the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text"></xref> property in the new class instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, composition text, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> setting as initial values for the new instance.
An input manager to associate with this text composition.
A source element for this text composition.
The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
A string containing the initial text for the composition.
This parameter will become the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text"></xref> property in the new class instance.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying desired auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
Gets the auto-complete setting for this text composition.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying the current auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
Completes this text composition.
This method calls the static <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A> method with this text composition as the input parameter.
Gets or sets the composition text for this text composition.
A string containing the composition text for this text composition.
Gets or sets any control text associated with this text composition.
A string containing any control text associated with this text composition.
Gets or sets the system composition text for this text composition.
A string containing the system composition text for this text composition.
Gets or sets the system text for this text composition.
A string containing the system text for this text composition.
Gets or sets the current text for this text composition.
A string containing the current text for this text composition.
